body.name: Advanced Clinicals Vitamin C Face & Body Cream Moisturizing Skin Care Lotion, Anti Aging Vitamin C Skincare Moisturizer For Body, Face, Age Spots, Wrinkles, & Sun Damaged Skin, Large 16oz (2-Pack)

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Green Coffee Bean Oil Firming Cream

features: VITAMIN C – Incorporating a Vitamin C infused body lotion into your daily skincare routine can help to promote a more healthy, radiant, & youthful-looking complexion. Vitamin C helps promote an even skin tone, while also helping stimulate collagen production to improve skin elasticity + firmness. Vitamin C also helps to minimize redness or irritation in the skin, helps protect from environmental stressors like UV rays, and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines, sun damage, & wrinkles.

RADIANT SKIN – This Advanced Clinicals Vitamin C Body Cream helps refine the look of aging skin and uneven skin tone. Vitamin C helps promote an even skin tone, while also helping stimulate collection production to help improve skin elasticity + firmness. Advanced Brightening Vitamin C Body Cream & Face Lotion helps refine the look of discolored skin, age spots, freckles, sun damage from sunspots, rough skin texture, hyperpigmentation, & acne-scars.

EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS – Advanced Clinicals Vitamin C Body Lotion is formulated with the perfect combination of effective anti aging + brightening ingredients, including Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, Glycerin, & More. Coconut Oil deeply moisturizes the skin, improves elasticity, & provides a protective barrier to help prevent moisture loss. Vitamin E helps protect skin against free radicals + UV Damage. Aloe Vera helps calm + hydrate the skin.

NON-GREASY & ABSORBS EASY – This Non-Greasy Vitamin C infused formula absorbs easily into the skin and is rich enough to be a long-lasting body moisturizer, but also gentle enough to be used as daily facial moisturizer. Formulated to be safe for all skin types, including oily skin + sensitive skin. Hydrate, Brighten, & Moisturize dull, lackluster skin with this Advanced Clinicals Vitamin C Face & Body Moisturizer Lotion to help leave your skin looking smoother, firmer, & more radiant.

BRIGHTEN, RENEW, & RESTORE – Dermatologist-Tested, Clinically-Tested, & Allergy-Tested. Manufactured In Our FDA Inspected Lab in Chicago, USA. Whatever your skin type, Advanced Clinicals has its natural solution. Restore a more youthful glow to your skin with the power of Vitamin C and scientifically proven formulas. At Advanced Clinicals, we’re committed to helping you feel confident in your skin. We prioritize your positive experience and ensure it with proven solutions.
body.description: Lift Your Features, Live in BeautyUsing a Vitamin C cream in your skin care routine is an excellent choice to experience the vision of younger-looking skin. Our Vitamin C face & body cream provides a protective moisture barrier while quenching thirsty skin, so you can say Goodbye to visible fine lines & wrinkles.Brightens your complexion, visibly relieving darkening & sun damageClinically proven to increase skin luminosityVisibly reduces signs of ageing, giving you a smoother, brighter, & natural gleam.Pure Ingredients, Premium BenefitsNature provides the ingredients, while science enhances & confirms the potency of each cosmeceutical formula that Advanced Clinicals produces, giving you the most effective & safe, clean beauty products available. Thanks to our natural botanicals, pure vitamins, potent proprietary formulas & premium grade products, your skin benefits without taking the harsh hit & irritation that come with many cosmetic products. The botanical sources in our formulas are carefully selected from highly-valued suppliers. Then, they're combined in our USA production facilities, meeting unwavering quality & safety standards.Soak your skin-whatever its type-in pure results with your moisturizing Vitamin C face & body cream! This Advanced Clinicals Vitamin C moisturizer lotion gives you a healthy and radiant complexion by improving your skin texture and skin tone. Our ingredients provide additional skin hydration and soothing benefits.Advanced Clinicals, Where Quality Is Never A QuestionWe pride ourselves in creating pure, proven essentials that restore with every spread, pump, or spray. Experience our dedication to excellence with this Vitamin C Body & Face Cream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Evened out my skin tone and made my skin softer
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for a few weeks now all over my body after taking a shower (so about 2x/day) and it helped even out my skin tone, made my skin brighter and gave my skin a nice, healthy glow. A small pump goes a long way and it does take a bit of rubbing to fully absorb into the skin but it doesn't feel sticky or oily at all. I like the faint, clean smell it has and the fact that the smell doesn't linger. I don't notice the smell after about an hour of having it on. I like that I can even use it on my face and neck and it didn't break me out. I had a farmer's tan on my arms and it helped even out the skin color. It helped lighten some post acne marks on face and neck. My elbows and knees don't look so dark and ashy like before. I am definitely going to keep using this. I think the formula is great, so hopefully they don't change it. I definitely recommend this product, but if you are using it for the purposes I've mentioned, I suggest using a sunscreen and sun protective clothing when you go outside so you don't undo all the work you've done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful anti-aging cream
reviews.reviewText: This facial and body rescue cream is smooth, moisturizes the skin, absorbs quickly, has a fantastic fragrance Bulgarian rose 🌹, which is not overwhelming. Love all advanced clinicals products. And the price is very good. Wod recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looking for a light, yet moisturizing cream?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered this product during Prime Days wanted to give it a try at a great price. I have been using for a couple months and have found this cream is not greasy and quickly absorbs into skin. The consistency is between a lotion and a cream. Has a very light scent that does not clash with any other scent I choose to wear. The container states hands, face, and body / I have not used on my face, but great for hands and body. I have not noticed any lightening of dark spots, but will give it time. This product comes in a tub with a pump, which sits great on my counter. Overall, for me, I think this is a good product at a great price - I use other products from this brand and have been happy with the quality and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this product.The skin on my arms was so thin, terribly dry, cracked, cut, bruised and sensitive. My arms actually hurt when I touched them. Anything I simply brushed against bruised and/or cut me. Just about anything would become a wound that would really bleed and require cleaning and bandaging. (My husband joked he should just wrap me in bubble-wrap.) He was so good to “doctor” my wounds. We were getting worried, as it just was getting worse.I also had a problem with extremely dry skin in the inner corners of my eyes. I’d tried several products, but they really didn’t work, either. I had to be so careful using anything around my eyes, so as not to irritate them, causing salty tears, resulting in crusty eye corners. Going around in circles and getting nowhere.I’d tried lots of advanced therapy lotions and creams for dry and sensitive skin. Most left my skin oily or greasy. None really absorbed into my skin. In desperation, we began searching online for something that would help. We decided to try Advanced Clinicals Retinol Body Lotion Moisturizer Face Lotion & Body Cream.It’s been just wonderful. I experienced immediate results. It is NOT oily or greasy! The Cream absorbed into my skin, immediately began repairing, and plumped it up. My sensitivity is nothing like it was before I began using it.It has no fragrance. There is no irritation to my eyes, so I can use it everywhere my body was needing deep hydration and moisturizing (my face, around my eyes, my neck and arms.) It has restored my skin barrier for protection. I actually have smooth skin again.I’ve been using it just 9 days and feel very comfortable recommending it to anyone who is looking for something like this. It lives up to its advertisement.A little bit goes a long way. Apply it sparingly. Not necessary to lavish it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Advanced Clinicals Hyaluronic Acid Body Lotion for years and wondered if they had any other lotions in their line because of how well that works for hydrating my skin but i am getting older now (54) and need a little extra something to keep my skin tight and wrinkle free. I saw this and decided to give it a try. I am amazed at how short of at time i have been using it before i noticed a difference in my skin.Less than a week and the skin on my thighs appears tighter, more hydrated and the skin above my knees has the best results because i had lost a bunch of weight do to an illness and the skin started to sag and i noticed some semi-circle type wrinkles/lines that i find unattractive, especially in the summer. They are nearly unnoticeable and the skin is evenly hydrated. This has been an issue for me for over a year, and am so happy i found something that actually works, not promises to and doesn't we have all been there, you spend tons of money on something and get let down over and over again.We ladies just want a company that will help us beautify our skin without breaking the bank and being let down. and I HAVE!!I also am trying this on my neck and chest area, to get rid of and prevent any further "side sleeper" lines.I am in love with Advanced Clinicals.Since their body lotions work so well, i decided to start using their gel face masks. I bought the Collagen Anti Aging Gel Mask W/Coconut Oil & Rosewater + Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Gel Mask W/Soothing Chamomile 2-Pack Skin Care Set. Hydrating Facial Skincare Mask Bundle.The very first time i used it, i was very surprised and the results. My face was so soft and my skin had the glow i have never had before. Most products like these from designed brands are so pricey and you never know if they really work. I am sticking with Advanced Clinicals for many years to come. I highly recommend all of their products, i promise you will not be disappointed.I know my review seems over the top for this company but that is how much i like it & want others to know

I have very dry skin in the wintertime time so I was looking for some soothing body lotion. I stumbled on this by chance and decided to give it a try. It goes on very nicely, not greasy and my skin stays smooth. Also, a little goes a long way. and I appreciate the fact that it's fragrance-free.

For the price, I couldn't believe the quality of this product. I have horribly dry skin and it really helps. I love that it is unscented, too, as I can easily get itchy from scents. This lotion has never bothered me. The two large containers last for ages! A great buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Advanced Clinicals Green Coffee Bean Oil Thermo-firming
reviews.reviewText: LLEGO ROTA Y NO HUELE MUY BIEN ESTA CARA

I was skeptical to order this cream because it is not a well known brand but I don't want to spend so much money on well known brand creams either. So I took a chance and I don't regret it at all. This cream I have used it for 2 weeks straight morning and night all over my face and neck ...I don't know but I think it has brighten my skin and keeping my skin nicely moisturize too. It saved me a lot of money. Ferulic acid and Vit C, hydraronic acid works well together. I have sensitive skin, very mild roscacea and it worked wonders to my skin. I will buy it again.,

Un producto de buena calidad al costo que lo estás adquiriendo, el desempeño del producto dependera del tipo de piel que uno tenga, pero en general, no es grasosa y deja un terminado suave en la piel, estoy contenta con la compra
